00022 class QwtSplineCurveFitter::PrivateData
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     PrivateData():
00026         fitMode(QwtSplineCurveFitter::Auto),
00027         splineSize(250)
00028     {
00029     }
00030 
00031     QwtSpline spline;
00032     QwtSplineCurveFitter::FitMode fitMode;
00033     int splineSize;
00034 };
00035 
00036 QwtSplineCurveFitter::QwtSplineCurveFitter()
00037 {
00038     d_data = new PrivateData;
00039 }
00040 
00041 QwtSplineCurveFitter::~QwtSplineCurveFitter()
00042 {
00043     delete d_data;
00044 }

00047 {
00048     d_data->fitMode = mode;

00052 {

00056 void QwtSplineCurveFitter::setSpline(const QwtSpline &spline)
00057 {

00059     d_data->spline.reset();

00063 {
00064     return d_data->spline;

00068 {
00069     return d_data->spline;

00072 void QwtSplineCurveFitter::setSplineSize(int splineSize)
00073 {
00074     d_data->splineSize = qwtMax(splineSize, 10);
00075 }

00078 {
00079     return d_data->splineSize;

00081 
00082 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00083 QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> QwtSplineCurveFitter::fitCurve(
00084     const QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> & points) const
00085 #else
00086 QPolygonF QwtSplineCurveFitter::fitCurve(
00087     const QPolygonF &points) const
00088 #endif
00089 {
00090     const int size = (int)points.size();
00091     if ( size <= 2 )
00092         return points;
00093 
00094     FitMode fitMode = d_data->fitMode;
00095     if ( fitMode == Auto )
00096     {
00097         fitMode = Spline;
00098 
00099         const QwtDoublePoint *p = points.data();
00100         for ( int i = 1; i < size; i++ )
00101         {
00102             if ( p[i].x() <= p[i-1].x() )
00103             {
00104                 fitMode = ParametricSpline;
00105                 break;
00106             }
00107         };
00108     }
00109 
00110     if ( fitMode == ParametricSpline )
00111         return fitParametric(points);
00112     else
00113         return fitSpline(points);
00114 }
00115 
00116 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00117 QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> QwtSplineCurveFitter::fitSpline(
00118     const QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> &points) const
00119 #else
00120 QPolygonF QwtSplineCurveFitter::fitSpline(
00121     const QPolygonF &points) const
00122 #endif
00123 {
00124     d_data->spline.setPoints(points);
00125     if ( !d_data->spline.isValid() )
00126         return points;
00127 
00128 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00129     QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> fittedPoints(d_data->splineSize);
00130 #else
00131     QPolygonF fittedPoints(d_data->splineSize);
00132 #endif
00133 
00134     const double x1 = points[0].x();
00135     const double x2 = points[int(points.size() - 1)].x();
00136     const double dx = x2 - x1;
00137     const double delta = dx / (d_data->splineSize - 1);
00138 
00139     for (int i = 0; i < d_data->splineSize; i++)
00140     {
00141         QwtDoublePoint &p = fittedPoints[i];
00142 
00143         const double v = x1 + i * delta;
00144         const double sv = d_data->spline.value(v);
00145 
00146         p.setX(qRound(v));
00147         p.setY(qRound(sv));
00148     }
00149     d_data->spline.reset();
00150 
00151     return fittedPoints;
00152 }
00153 
00154 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00155 QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> QwtSplineCurveFitter::fitParametric(
00156     const QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> &points) const
00157 #else
00158 QPolygonF QwtSplineCurveFitter::fitParametric(
00159     const QPolygonF &points) const
00160 #endif
00161 {
00162     int i;
00163     const int size = points.size();
00164 
00165 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00166     QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> fittedPoints(d_data->splineSize);
00167     QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> splinePointsX(size);
00168     QwtArray<QwtDoublePoint> splinePointsY(size);
00169 #else
00170     QPolygonF fittedPoints(d_data->splineSize);
00171     QPolygonF splinePointsX(size);
00172     QPolygonF splinePointsY(size);
00173 #endif
00174 
00175     const QwtDoublePoint *p = points.data();
00176     QwtDoublePoint *spX = splinePointsX.data();
00177     QwtDoublePoint *spY = splinePointsY.data();
00178 
00179     double param = 0.0;
00180     for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
00181     {
00182         const double x = p[i].x();
00183         const double y = p[i].y();
00184         if ( i > 0 )
00185         {
00186             const double delta = sqrt( qwtSqr(x - spX[i-1].y())
00187                       + qwtSqr( y - spY[i-1].y() ) );
00188             param += qwtMax(delta, 1.0);
00189         }
00190         spX[i].setX(param);
00191         spX[i].setY(x);
00192         spY[i].setX(param);
00193         spY[i].setY(y);
00194     }
00195 
00196     d_data->spline.setPoints(splinePointsX);
00197     if ( !d_data->spline.isValid() )
00198         return points;
00199 
00200     const double deltaX =
00201         splinePointsX[size - 1].x() / (d_data->splineSize-1);
00202     for (i = 0; i < d_data->splineSize; i++)
00203     {
00204         const double dtmp = i * deltaX;
00205         fittedPoints[i].setX(qRound(d_data->spline.value(dtmp)));
00206     }
00207 
00208     d_data->spline.setPoints(splinePointsY);
00209     if ( !d_data->spline.isValid() )
00210         return points;
00211 
00212     const double deltaY =
00213         splinePointsY[size - 1].x() / (d_data->splineSize-1);
00214     for (i = 0; i < d_data->splineSize; i++)
00215     {
00216         const double dtmp = i * deltaY;
00217         fittedPoints[i].setY(qRound(d_data->spline.value(dtmp)));
00218     }
00219 
00220     return fittedPoints;
00221 }
